Description: Limestone mummy-label of Pekysis, son of Pachumis the Elder.
Curator's comments: Published in S. P. Vleeming, Demotic and Greek-Demotic Mummy Labels and Other Short texts gathered from Many Publications (Studia Demotica 9; Leuven: Peeters), no. 422.
Bibliographic references: Arlt 2011 / Deine Seele möge leben für immer und ewig: Die demotischen Mumienschilder im British Museum (no.16)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Prof Francis W Kelsey
